completeListOfAbilities.desc:
6-hit group melee  PG attack + single-target  PF attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target

Self: 6 turns Guardian Blades buff
Counters  PG attacks with 2-hit melee  PG attack while Guardian Blades buff active ( PG attack +  PF attack excluded)

passives.name: Awakening Extension
passives.desc:
Awakening use +1

When using Awakening:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Slight boost to raised MAX BRVã€? ATK from Awakening buff
 â€¢ Triggers additional  PF attack after use

When using Furious Blades:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 4; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage

While Awakening active:
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ ( PG attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage; higher turn rate)

When using Awakeningã€? Furious Bladesã€? BRV Attack+:
 â€¢ Furious Blades becomes Furious Blades+ (stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoningã€? support; returns to Furious Blades after use) after inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
